item.description:
RSVPs are closed, but you can still purchase tickets at the door and meet up with the group. See below for details on where you can find us.

Live Music - TOP BLUES BANDS

Noon - 7pm (Gate opens at 11:30am) Rain or Shine

We'll meet at the entrance at 11:00 am so when the gates open at 11:30 am we can all find a good spot together. We'll shoot for the big tree on the hill for shade.

Directions to where we will be seating...

If you plan on coming later you can still find us... After you walk through security and enter the complex, walk towards the end of the beer booths facing the stage and turn right. You will see the hill and a big tree halfway up the hill. We'll be there.  Call if you can't find us. Will give out my cell # to people attending. 

Dozens of Regional Craft Breweries, PLUS a special booth featuring cask-conditioned ale

GREAT Food, such as BBQ, grilled chicken, hotdogs/hamburgers, Oktoberfest food, snacks, etc!

Blues 'N' Brews is a project of the Westford Rotary Charitable Endowment, Inc. Beneficiaries of the funds raised from this year's festival include the Multiple Sclerosis Society (Blister Buddies), Merrimack Valley Food Bank, Second Chance Fund for Animal Welfare, Lowell Humane Society, Animal Rescue League of Boston, Massachusetts National Guard Family Support Fund, Friends Forever International Peace Program, and various scholarships and projects supported by Westford Rotary Club.

Purchase your ticket through this meetup event site for only $29 while they last - I have only a few left at this price! After that you will need to purchase them on your own. Tickets are $35 at the door. Please read Important Payment Info below...

How to Get Your Tickets

You will need your id to pick up your tickets at the ticket booth when you arrive.

Price Includes: 10 Beverage Tasting Tickets
Tickets can be used for beer, wine, and any alternative beverages (such as hard lemonade and hard cider) that are being offered in the beer tents, as well as water or soda. You can purchase additional tickets for $1 each at the Rotary booth.

Bring a lawn chair and an umbrella (just incase). This event is rain or shine.

Important Info...

  • No Pets
  • No Coolers or any Food and Beverage can be brought in
  • No Readmission
  • Bring an umbrella

Please read the complete Rules & Regulations by clicking here...

Important Payment Info

You will need to have a valid picture ID to pick up your ticket at the will call box upon arrival. You may arrive any time to get your ticket.

If you need to cancel, we will do our best to re-sell your ticket and get you a full refund. However, if you purchased tickets on your own, we will not be able to and the organization does not give refunds. So it is best to purchase your tickets through this meetup site.

If you have signed up on this site but have not submitted payment, you do not have a ticket unless you purchased them on your own.
item.name: Nashoba Blues & Brews Festival
